product.name: TokeShimi 36 x 36 Inch Wall Mirror Black Bathroom Vanity Mirror with Metal Frame Aluminum Alloy Soft Rounded Corner for Modern Farmhouse Wall Decor 1”Deep Set Design (Horizontal/Vertical)
product.description:
Aluminum Frame Mirror
Enhanced Aluminum Mirror
Metal Framed Round mirror
Beveled Mirror
Arched Mirror

product.bullet_points:
• ❥NON-RUSTING BLACK MATTE ALUMINUM ALLOY METAL FRAME MIRRO : Durable aluminum alloy combines with oxidation process makes BROWN frame with unique brush/matte texture, more metallic, non-deformed and non-rusting and more More durable than Aluminum Alloy. Will not rust in wet environments. Horizontal/Vertical installation.
• ❥PRACTICAL AND DECORATIVE ROUNDED CORNER RECTANGLE MIRRORS: DIMENSION (36×36inch,0.8inch depth, 2inch thickness).TokeShimi black wall mirror has modern, minimalist, farmhouse and industrial style appearance which is the prefect addition to your bathroom,powder room, dining room,living room ,hall,etc. Multi-size offers(24x32,24x36,36x30,40x30,48x30,48x36,55x36,60x30,60x36,72x36,65x22).
• ❥STURDY and 3 LAYERS FOAM Packaging:Tokeshimi brown vanity mirror is secured with customized 3 layer foam in carton box passed all rigorous tests including dropping, impact test which is very sturdy and make sure to provide mirrors in perfect condition for you.
• ❥HD REFECTION AND 4MM SHATTERPROOF GLASS:Tokeshimi mirror adopts 5-layer float technology to ensure 1:1 restoration of real image, no distortion, fast dispersion of fog and corrosion resistant and not easy to oxidize.Easy to clean.
• ❥Professional Service Team:please don't hesitate to contact us, we will reply you within 24 hours ASAP and we provide a full reimburse or replacement for quality on arrival including broken，distorted and defects.
